functions.name: query_atoms
functions.description: Query AtomSpace for atoms matching a pattern. Returns atoms by type, name, or relationship.

atom_type.description: Type of atom to query (ConceptNode, PredicateNode, InheritanceLink, etc.)

atom_name.description: Optional name pattern to match (supports wildcards with *)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

functions.name: create_query
functions.description: Convert natural language query to AtomSpace GetLink/BindLink pattern

query_type.description: Type of query to generate (get=simple retrieval, bind=pattern match with action, satisfy=boolean check)

functions.name: execute_pattern
functions.description: Execute a pattern matching query on AtomSpace

pattern.description: The Scheme code pattern to execute

atomspace.description: Name of the AtomSpace to query (default: default)
